name: The Keepers of the Songlines
description:
The Land of Dreams : the origin of aboriginal culture, an era prior to the formation of the world, in which everything took shape and life, inhabited by totemic ancestral beings. Within this era, we find one of the first men, the adventurous aboriginal Warrin who will embark on his long solitary introspective journey.

The young aboriginal will have to follow the Songlines : they are invisible paths undertaken by totemic ancestral ancestors during their journey, which reveal traces left by their actions and signs of their passage in the world. Music is equivalent to a special map that describes the territory crossed by its path.

Follow the music, the Songlines allow you to cross the whole territory on foot without getting lost, furthermore, each of them leads to a totemic ancestor sacred place. These sacred places are impregnated with arcane and magic, and they convey symbolic meanings that can only be understood by finding and reading the "Songs".

Having acquired the knowledge of all sixteen Songs, the brave Aboriginal will be spiritually ready to go to “Ulrock”, the sacred mountain, to discover a special song of the Keepers of the Songlines. Knowledge is a personal choice, it is freedom, it will be up to the player to decide whether to get it or not in order to reach a personal conclusion.

Details:

  • Take place in an open world to explore the Australia continent.
  • Symbolic meanings : the symbolism, giving value, spiritual essence and meaning to an object, a sacred place, an animal are the core of the game.
  • Emotional music.
  • The main objective is to find and read all the Totemic Ancestors songs written
    symbolically in some scrolls, to acquire knowledge and answers about life.
  • Use the " slow down time mode" to overcome some obstacles.

SYSTEM REQUIRIMENTS

  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+ 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.4GHz CPU Dual Core 
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 650 with 1GB Memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

          

RECOMMENDED:

  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+ 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 950 with 2GB Memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
